Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.service.interfaces

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service for doing CRUD operations for users, customers and companies in the database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteUserById​(java.util.UUID id)
    Deletes user and related customer/company for the supplied id
    void enableUser​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Enables the user with supplied id
    java.util.List<java.lang.Object> findAllUsers()
    Retrieves all customer/company users
    Company findCompanyById​(java.util.UUID id)
    Retrieve a company object for the supplied id
    Customer findCustomerById​(java.util.UUID id)
    Retrieve a customer object for the supplied id
    User findUserById​(java.util.UUID id)
    Retrieve a user object for the supplied id
    java.lang.Object getFullUserInfoByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
    Retrieves all info for a customer/company user
    java.lang.Object getFullUserInfoById​(java.util.UUID id)
    Retrieves all info for a customer/company user
    CompanyUserResponse saveCompanyUser​(User user, Company company)
    Saves a company user to the database
    CustomerUserResponse saveCustomerUser​(User user, Customer customer)
    Saves a customer user to the database
    java.lang.Object updateUser​(java.util.UUID id, UpdateUserRequest updateUserRequest)
    Updates a customer/company user with the fields supplied in the UpdateUserRequest
    void validateNotAlreadyRegistered​(java.lang.String email)
    Validates that a customer/company user is not already registered for a supplied email

  • Method Details

    • findAllUsers

      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves all customer/company users
      Returns:
      list of all users with full user information including user as well as related customer/company

    • getFullUserInfoById

      java.lang.Object getFullUserInfoById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieves all info for a customer/company user
      Parameters:
      id - the id for which to retrieve full user information
      Returns:
      full user information including user as well as related customer/company for the supplied user id

    • getFullUserInfoByEmail

      java.lang.Object getFullUserInfoByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
      Retrieves all info for a customer/company user
      Parameters:
      email - the email for which to retrieve full user information
      Returns:
      full user information including user as well as related customer/company for the supplied email

    • saveCustomerUser

      CustomerUserResponse saveCustomerUser​(User user, Customer customer)
      Saves a customer user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be saved
      customer - the customer object to be saved
      Returns:
      the newly saved customer user

    • saveCompanyUser

      CompanyUserResponse saveCompanyUser​(User user, Company company)
      Saves a company user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be saved
      company - the company object to be saved
      Returns:
      the newly saved company user

    • validateNotAlreadyRegistered

      void validateNotAlreadyRegistered​(java.lang.String email)
      Validates that a customer/company user is not already registered for a supplied email
      Parameters:
      email - the email to validate is not already registered

    • findUserById

      User findUserById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieve a user object for the supplied id
      Parameters:
      id - the user id for which to retrieve a user object
      Returns:
      the user object retrieved for the supplied id

      Company findCompanyById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieve a company object for the supplied id

      id - the user id for which to retrieve a company object
      Returns:
      the company object retrieved for the supplied id

    • deleteUserById

      void deleteUserById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Deletes user and related customer/company for the supplied id
      Parameters:
      id - the user id for which to delete a customer/company user

    • updateUser

      java.lang.Object updateUser​(java.util.UUID id, UpdateUserRequest updateUserRequest)
      Updates a customer/company user with the fields supplied in the UpdateUserRequest
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the customer/company user to be updated
      updateUserRequest - request object including fields that should be updated
      Returns:
      the newly updated customer/company user

    • enableUser

      void enableUser​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Enables the user with supplied id
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to be enabled
